optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats

Class HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator

  • java.lang.Object
    • optimization.stochastic.operators.onFloats.HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HeterogenousMutationInterface, MutationInterface, TwoDevsMutationInterface

    public class HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator
extends java.lang.Object
implements HeterogenousMutationInterface, TwoDevsMutationInterface
    Heterogenous float mutator where each feature has a separate probability of mutating by a small or a large amount.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator

        public HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator(float[] stDevSmall,
                               float[] stDevBig,
                               float[] lowerBounds,
                               float[] upperBounds,
                               float pSmall)
        Parameters:
        stDevSmall - An array of standard deviations of small mutations for all the features.
        stDevBig - An array of standard deviations of large mutations for all the features.
        lowerBounds - Lower value bounds.
        upperBounds - Upper value bounds.
        pSmall - Probability of a small mutation.

      • HeterogenousTwoDevsFloatMutator

                               int endIndex,
                               float pSmall)
        Parameters:

        stDevBig - An array of standard deviations of large mutations for all the features.
        lowerBounds - Lower value bounds.
        upperBounds - Upper value bounds.
        beginIndex - The index of the first feature to mutate.
        endIndex - The index of the last feature to mutate.
        pSmall - Probability of a small mutation.
